marketing.title: Ready to Experience Paradise?
marketing.subtitle: Book your dream villa today and create unforgettable memories.

about.title: Looking for the
about.description: Nestled in a peaceful natural setting, Villa Tolping offers a warm and welcoming space for families, friends, and groups to gather and create meaningful moments. With a spacious yard, refreshing greenery, and comfortable facilities, our villa provides the perfect atmosphere for relaxing, celebrating, and enjoying time together.
about.descriptioncont: Watch the video to see real guest experiences, then explore the complete amenities we provide below.
about.titlefacilities: Discover the facilities available at our villa

booking.title: How It Works
booking.subtitle: Simple step to secure your perfect villa getaway with flexible payments options

step1.title: Explore Our Gallery
step1.description: Browse thorugh stunning images of our villa to envision your stay.

step2.title: Inquire via Contact
step2.description: React out to us with any questions. We're here to help.

step3.title: Confirm Booking
step3.description: Choose your date, pay a down payment, and secure your reservation.

step4.title: Repayment
step4.description: Complete the remaining payment easily before your stay.

contact.title: Get in Touch with Us
contact.description: For inquiries, or to schedule a service, reach out to us today. Our dedicated team is here to assist you every step of the way.
contact.descriptioncont: Contact us via WhatsApp, email, or media social to get started.

pay.title: Payment Methods
pay.info: We accept bank transfers and major e-wallets for your convenience.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answer to common questions about

faq-1.question: How do I book stay at the villa?
faq-1.answer: Booking your stay is simple — just click the WhatsApp button, and you’ll be instantly connected with our villa’s customer service. Our friendly team will guide you through the booking process, confirm availability, and help with any details you need — all in real time for a smooth and personal experience.

faq-2.question: Is a down payment(DP) required?
faq-2.answer: Yes, a small down payment is required to secure your reservation. The minimum down payment is 50% of the villa rental price.

faq-3.question: What facilities are included
faq-3.answer: The villa includes a private pool, kitchen, WiFi, air conditioning, and Spacious front yard. Additional services are available upon request.

faq-4.question: Is the Villa suitable for families or groups?
faq-4.answer: Absolutely! Our villa is perfect for families and groups, offering spacious rooms and shared areas for quality time together.

faq-5.question: Can i cancel or rescedule my booking?
faq-5.answer: Yes, cancellations and reschedules are possible depending on our policy. Please contact customer service for details.
